meanings.sent1: The uncongenial weather made everyone stay indoors.
meanings.sent2: The uncongenial neighbor never greeted anyone.
meanings.sent3: The uncongenial cat refused to be petted by anyone.
meanings.sent4: The uncongenial atmosphere at work was like a dark cloud hanging over everyone.
meanings.sent5: The uncongenial receptionist made visitors feel unwelcome.

meanings.sent2: The uncongenial colors of the room made it hard to relax.
meanings.sent3: The uncongenial mix of flavors in the dish left a strange taste in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: Their uncongenial relationship was like oil and water, never mixing well.
meanings.sent5: The uncongenial puzzle pieces just wouldn't fit together no matter how hard I tried.

meanings.definition: Not conducive to comfort or happiness.
meanings.sent1: The uncongenial bed was too hard to sleep on comfortably.
meanings.sent2: The uncongenial silence in the house made it feel eerie.
meanings.sent3: The uncongenial weather ruined our plans for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: The uncongenial news cast a shadow over the family gathering.
meanings.sent5: The uncongenial surroundings made it impossible to relax and unwind.
